description: My first project ever, created during the bootcamp, coded entirely in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
My passion for music concerts inspired the creation of this website. It aims to record all the concerts I've been to.
Final project for the Bootcamp, an  E-commerce in the travel service for those seeking an experience beyond traditional travel packages.
The first version of my website/portfolio.
Frontend Developer challenge. The objective is to built this landing page, having as reference only the Figma file provided, and get it looking as close to the design as possible.
